title: Sam Bankman-Fried Chucks the Crisis Communications Playbook
description: Instead of avoiding media attention, the former FTX chief has gone full-bore in trying to explain the sudden crash of the once-highflying crypto exchange.

title: Amazon Executive Who Oversaw Entertainment Push Exits Company
description: Veteran Amazon.com Inc. executive Jeff Blackburn, who played a key role in the tech giant’s push into entertainment, is leaving the company.

title: Thomas Zacharia Knows the Power of Innovation
description: The outgoing director of Oak Ridge National Laboratory looks to supercomputers to help solve the problems of tomorrow.

title: Fashion in the Metaverse: What Avatars Are Wearing
description: Natalia Modenova and Daria Shapovalova, co-founders of digital fashion retailer DressX, believe style will be important—even in a virtual world

title: John Palmour Changed Recipe for Making Microchips
description: As a grad student, John Palmour took a chance on an unproven way to make semiconductors, and went on to co-found a strategically important maker of silicon carbide and gallium nitride electronic devices, Wolfspeed Inc.

title: U.S. to Probe Cyberattacks Linked to Lapsus$
description: The hacking collective has been behind recent corporate attacks affecting Uber, Nvidia, Microsoft and others.

title: Canada Pushes Canadian Content, Irking Big Tech
description: The proposal would require digital platforms to rework algorithms to feature content from Canadian artists.

title: Kids Don't Want Money Any More
description: A massive cohort of tech-savvy youngsters are learning to flex their financial independence through Roblox, one of the most popular kids’ online hangouts and a place where brands are increasingly setting up shop to reach them.

title: Kanye West Suspended From Twitter After Swastika Tweet
description: The musician and designer, who now legally goes by Ye, posted a picture of a swastika merged with the Star of David.
